options.text: Long and full Life Line
options.answer: Strong life line represents a long life full of vitality and health. Those with a long and full Life Line are usually energetic. You tends to be stable and have an instinct for homemaking. You have the stamina to get things done. You could play a key role and people count on you to stay strong in difficult times. Psychologically, you give people a sense of being real and practical.

options.text: Short and thin Life Line
options.answer: There’re always a misunderstanding that short life line indicate short life. It’s exaggerated, though it suggests there is a shortness of energy when facing difficulties in life. Specifically, energy isn’t abundant in long term, therefore having less energy for daily routine physical activities. While it’s possible of having plenty of energy in the short term. When ignited, you can effective turn your energy into a lot of creative ideas. To strengthen your life line, try to establishing fixed patterns of eating, sleeping and exercising.

options.text: Broken Life Line
options.answer: A break on your dominant hand indicates a major life change, which could be positive or negative. When reading breaks and markings, you can assume that they are relevant to events chronologically. People with a broken life line like to lose themselves in endless problem solving, so it’s often that they would go through challenges in life without reviewing the lesson. Try to keep a habit of reflecting, it helps you sail longer than others.

options.text: Double Life Line
options.answer: Those with two life lines are full of energy. They have the ability to travel extensively, for the reason such as having two homes, belonging to two countries or even living two lifestyles. Extra line life indicates that you have great confidence in yourself and you’re more likely to take risks.

options.text: Base segment has a fork branching away from the thumb
options.answer: For most of those having a fork branching away from the thumb, they have two different lifestyles. It could be being a second generation immigrants or belong to two cultures.

options.text: I do not have a fork on Life line
Long line ending under the little finger area
options.answer: A long head line reveals your advantage on intelligence. A person with a long line thinks a long way into the future, every possibilities would be analyzed. You probably think before jump, so making a decision need reflection. You should enjoy quizzes and mind puzzles, or other things that seems to be obscure and abstract to others. However, you can spend time on it and process the information.

options.text: Short line ending under the middle finger area
options.answer: A short Head Line means that you’re focus on present. You tend to master a specialist skill and concentrate on a certain aspect. You could develop your own theory of doing things. You’re a highly skilled doer and apply your theory practically.

options.text: Straight Line of Head
options.answer: People with straight head line often think straightly. Your thinking is logical and rational, and you like fact, and structured thinking systems. You enjoy sunshine and bright ideas.

options.text: Bent Line of Head
options.answer: If head line is bent, the view of reality tend to be not straightforward. These people like to spend time alone with darkness and shadows, moonlight and candles. They sometime would be moody and indulge with illusions. In others’ eye, they’re artists, poets, and spiritual aspirants.

options.text: Origin starts high up above Life line
options.answer: You should be confident and independent. Living far away from your family and friends would not be a challenge for you. You tend to be open-minded and keep seeking unusual and interesting ideas and experiences.

options.text: Origin down and touching the Life Line
options.answer: You should be living close to your roots or parents. You like to discuss with your parents, and consider their opinions when making decision. Sometime you’re sensitive but you would not like to find the feeling of safety from others.

options.text: Very low below the pinky
options.answer: Your Heart Line suggests that you have strong need for love and intimacy. You should be wide open to love, however, you may be misunderstood as being flirtatious. Actually, you’re a party animal and enjoy surrounded by others. It’s kind of hard for you to commit all your love to only one person.

options.text: Not so low below the pinky
options.answer: You have many close friends. You are open and share personal information freely, and you make friends easily. You feel comfortable with intimate relationships and with being close to friends.

options.text: Heart Line originates below pinky
options.answer: You do not feel a strong need for love, though you are open to love and an expression of commitment. You would not easily share personal feelings. You’re a very hard worker and devote much creativity and dedication to work.

options.text: Heart Line originates in pinky
options.answer: You love money. Be careful, your relationship problems will mostly related to money. Don’t let the money to hinder your intimate relationship. Make good use of money, it can be used for not only power but also dessert for love.

options.text: Curves up and ends close under middle finger
options.answer: You’re a practical person. You value present the most and you think it must be experienced fully. You would be emotionally down at this moment, but the next moment you mood will suddenly fire up. The psychological mood changes so fast just like tornado that clean up everything that block its way. Therefore, your partner would have a feeling of taking a roller coaster. As you want steady, reliable partner and financial security, you would be faithful.

options.text: Curves up and ends close under index finger.
options.answer: In a relationship, you would take good care of your partner with great love and caring. You tend to give and please your partner before your partner asking. However, you expect the equal return. It’s probably that your partner have a different point of view. You should learn to know that your style of showing love actually meet your own needs firstly. Be careful to prevent a resentful relationship.

options.text: Flat and short ending near middle of palm
options.answer: You could be a DIY person and like fixing things around you. You are practical, loyal, and dependable. You need your personal time to stay alone, and don’t like a partner who seize a lot of time and energy. You may quarrel with your partner sometime, and you then have to stay alone to calm down. Afterward, you can easily forget the bad feeling and forgive the wrongdoings.

options.text: Long and flat ending low under index finger
options.answer: You may be kind of sentimental and idealistic about relationships. You enjoy thinking, analyzing and diagnosing a relationship and spend most of time do that rather than take action. You might get lost in thinking over and over. You are willing and prepared to give up some personal comfort as to make relationship deeper. But when you meet the right person, you find relationship can be better than imagined, and sacrifices are not necessary.

options.text: Long and curving down at end
options.answer: You tend to please others, so you act the way that you think people expect you to act. You have the ability to reading people and then you can find the way the get alone with them. As you keep acting as expected, you might feel uncomfortable to show you real feeling and real idea.

options.text: Heart Line ending at edge of palm
options.answer: You are warm-hearted, and you love plants, trees, animals and people. You believe that you should give those in need a hand. Pay more attention to yourself and your partner, it helps to foster a more satisfactory relationship.

options.text: Fate Line is short or missing
options.answer: Your Fate Line is short or missing, it suggests that you may have not established a clear sense of your own character and purpose. Though you have the choice to do anything you want, you’re probably feel unbalanced and unfulfilled. You’re very easy to get along with and are quick to play and have fun. Don’t burn yourself out, you don’t have be what society wants you to be.

options.text: A long, deep, straight Fate Line
options.answer: A long / deep / straight Fate Line indicates that you have established a clear sense of your own character. People with a long and deep Fate Line are often workaholics, so you might keep finishing tasks and looking for more. Even when on vacations, you won’t let yourself totally stay idle. You enjoy working as you know you’re working toward what you want.

questions.question: The most important part of the line is the point where it starts.

options.text: Fate Line starts joined to the Life Line
options.answer: You’re a person that greatly affect by your roots / family or other background. You may follow the family profession or follow your parent’s advice on the choice of occupation. Your early family training and related values influence you greatly in decision making.

options.text: Fate Line starts from the centre of the palm
options.answer: You’re an independent person. You have your own idea of making decisions. You don’t depend on you family and friends’ opinion to choose your life style, occupation and others. In a sentence, you won’t blindly follow others, you make your own decision in you life.

options.text: Fate Line starts from the left part of the palm
options.answer: Your family’s values and desire have little effect on your career choice. You value your personal need and satisfaction, and they shape your career and life goals. You like adventure and exploration. You might work with the public with good social skills and solve problems with you creativity.

options.text: Fate Line starts half-way up the palm
options.answer: You need time to experience a lot of thing and develop a sense of balance, so as to become clearer about yourself. You might find the thing you really want midlife.

questions.question: Check Minor Lines. Girdles of Venus

options.text: "Girdles of Venus" Lines (One or more long lines. Even one short line here)
options.answer: Girdles of Venus is a line that appears on the palm at the base of the fingers, which forms a semicircle beginning between the first and second fingers and ending between the third and fourth fingers. Having this line, you are very sensitive about your connections and you’re afraid of a fast developed close relationship. As your feelings can be hurt by others, you need a partner that help you recover and foster confidence. Emotional support is important to you.

options.text: I dont have this line.

questions.question: Check Minor Lines. Line of Sun

options.text: Line of Sun runs vertically below the ring finger.
options.answer: Line of Sun indicates you have capability, talent and popularity which may lead to success. And it’s call the Line of Success and regarded as a sister line to the Fate Line as it could boost the fate line. You have gained the ability to put yourself deep into your own inner space. You may like to stay alone and get absorbed in doing your things, like practicing art, yoga or tai-chi.

options.text: I dont have this line
Loyalty line is a thick crease or line that crosses the thumb ball
options.answer: With Loyalty line, you should be very loyalty, which may be to the family, country, friends or favorite baseball team.

options.text: I dont have this line

questions.question: Check Minor Lines. Ring of Solomon

options.text: A line that curls around the base and cuts off the index finger
options.answer: The Ring of Solomon, also referred to as the Ring of Jupiter, is located at the bottom of the Jupiter finger (index finger) on its mount. It indicates you have strong leadership qualities and are usually found in positions of authority. You should be well respected by others because you’re intelligent and extremely tolerant and thoughtful of others.

options.text: I dont have this line
Water hands have a narrow, rectangular palm with long fingers. The middle fingers are seven-eighths the length of the palm and longer than the width.
options.answer: Water hand is also called the feeling hand. People with water hand would respond greatly to environment. You need a certain amount of freedom instead of strict discipline. You don’t like conflict and competition. You believe you can get the job done through teamwork and cooperation. When needed, you could be very self-sacrificial. You are subtle and emotionally acute. As you’re good at reading others’ feeling, you have a lot of ice breakers. You would be a perfect counsellors, therapists and healers.

options.text: Earth hands have square palms, are heavy-boned, solid and fleshy. They have short, stiff fingers. The middle finger is no longer than three quarters of the length of the palm.
options.answer: The earth shape hand is also referred to as the practical hand. You’re really practical. You think and act down to earth. You are not afraid of hard work. You are capable, reliable, helpful, and honest. As a realistic and practical person, yet you could be very creative. You are probably physically strong and have developed some manual skills. You enjoy teamwork and like to play team-orientated sports. You could be a great organizer and help the team to get things done. Emotionally, you are pretty straightforward, but you won’t easily revealing your feelings.

options.text: Air hands are square palmed and have long fingers. The middle digit is around seven-eighths the length of the palm or more.
options.answer: This shape is also called the thinking hand. The long fingers represent thinking and love of detail. You could think things through yourself. As you are inquisitive and willing to express, you should be a really good student, and instructor and advice giver. You’re interested in communication and technology. You also have talent in vocal or literary fields. As a result, you can be a person who can writing film scripts and books, programming computers, playing music or doing research. The emotional side of your life may be difficult to experience by others because you feel comfortable talking about your feelings rather than showing them.

options.text: Fire hands have firm, rectangular palms and the fingers are three quarters of the length of the palm (the palm being slightly broader than that of the Water hand).
options.answer: Fire hand is also called the intuitive hand. You are probably target orientated, and would be discouraged if the outcome come slow. Be careful of being impatient, it leads to failure. You’re are mostly the extroverted type and full of passion. You would like to shine every second and change the world. From all aspects, you are charismatic, energetic, and impulsive. As you are always looking for a challenge, you are a natural leaders.

questions.question: Compare your ring finger and your index finger length. One may be taller than the other.

options.text: Ring finger is taller than index finger
options.answer: You are a creative person and seeking a leadership position is not your priority. Your energies are for inventing new ways of getting things done and fostering new ideas. You would be satisfied if your job or career provide you the opportunity to expose your outstanding creativity. As the good result comes from creative method of solving problem, it further nurture your creative energy. This is not confined at work, you keep bringing a lot of freshness to life.

options.text: Index finger is taller than ring finger
options.answer: You are a person with natural leadership and strong personal power. Being a leader and using your personal power in a job or career can give you energy and satisfactory. Your strong and long index finger indicates that the Jupiter energies are abundant, as you are able to freely express a strong sense of leadership. It’s said that a strong dominant index finger on the right hand is often found on the successful major corporation CEO.

options.text: Both fingers are equal length
options.answer: Your fingers indicate your daily life is balanced. You share your ideas and discuss with others, but you won’t push others to accept your point of view. Normally, you don’t like to be forced to accept an idea. When every aspects including physical and mental is balanced, you could feel ease and confident.

options.text: Long ring finger tip is square
options.answer: Square tipped fingers suggest that you are a practical person. You like things are in order and value precision, regularity, and caution.

options.text: Long ring finger tip is pointy
options.answer: Pointy finger tips indicate you could be very intuitive. You could be a dreamer, poet, or mystic. Be careful of not being too fanatical!

options.text: Long ring finger tip is conic shaped
options.answer: Your conic tips reveal that you are a friendly and sociable person. You are imaginative, cheerful and easily influenced. Also, you are imaginative and kind of impulsive.

options.text: Long ring finger tip is spatulate shaped
options.answer: Your spatulate tips indicate creativity personality. You are full of new ideas and doing the routine job is not your favorite.

questions.question: First check your thumb angle. Hold your hands out in front of you relaxed and comfortable. Let your fingers and thumb settle into the least stressed position. Neither stiff nor limp.

options.text: A big thumb angle
options.answer: Your big thumb angle reveals that you are the one who is ready to take a shot to make big things happen. You are strongly independent and resourceful, so you can finish the task when others are gathering and organizing resource. Believe it or not, your large thumb angle is big indicator for success. It’s at your deepest subconscious level that you have energy to make big things happen out of the ordinary. As a result, you are always prepared for challenges. Your hard work and advantages would you closer to you target step by step.

options.text: A small thumb angle
options.answer: A small thumb angle reveals that you are a cautious person and involved in more mental than physical activities. You do not want to take action to change the outer world. You are used to be a follower, and don’t like to rush to do the job and claim credits. In most situation, you are a dreamer more than a doer. But when you are greatly supported by others, you are willing to get your hands dirty.

options.text: A long, wide, and thick thumb end zone
options.answer: Your long, wide and thick thumb indicates your abundant energy. You should learn to use your energy in positive ways, and do not let your abundance of energy get you too bossy. Only with you strong determination, you can achieve success.

options.text: Other
Thumb end zone stiff
options.answer: A rigid thumb end zone reveals that you are kind of stubborn and stick to want you wanted. You won’t easily change your mind after hearing others’ suggestions. Be careful that this may block out valuable things. You have the advantage to adhere to your goal, but receiving idea and help from others would make you closer to success.

options.text: Thumb end zone easily bends back
options.answer: When the end zone is easily bent back at a large angle, it suggests you are willing to bend your idea to help others and make other pleased. You could be a very good PR representative or negotiator. Reaching a consensus is good, but you should very carefully and objectively evaluate the details and situations.
